pages.title: Things To Do In Jaipur — 2026 Guide
pages.contentDirection: Comprehensive hub covering Amber Fort, City Palace, Hawa Mahal, and 15+ top attractions. Include 3-day itinerary, transport options (metro, auto-rickshaw rates ₹200-500), and seasonal considerations. Link to all category pages with preview content.

pages.title: Is Jaipur Safe For Tourists?
pages.contentDirection: Address safety in Old City vs New Jaipur, common gem/carpet scams near City Palace, safe areas like C-Scheme and MI Road. Include women's safety tips, reliable taxi services, and emergency contacts.

pages.title: How Many Days Do You Need In Jaipur?
pages.contentDirection: Recommend 3-4 days minimum covering Golden Triangle itinerary. Detail 1-day (forts only), 2-day (add markets), 3-day (add day trips), and 5-day (add cultural experiences) options with specific attractions and timing.

pages.title: What Is Jaipur Famous For?
pages.contentDirection: Cover Pink City architecture, Rajput heritage, gem cutting industry, block printing, and being part of Golden Triangle. Mention UNESCO World Heritage status and specific crafts like blue pottery and lac jewelry.

pages.title: Best Time To Visit Jaipur
pages.contentDirection: Detail October-March as ideal (15-25°C), avoid April-June heat (40°C+). Cover monsoon considerations, festival seasons (Diwali, Teej), and seasonal pricing differences for hotels (₹2000-8000 range variations).

pages.title: Where To Stay In Jaipur
pages.contentDirection: Compare Old City (heritage hotels ₹3000-15000), C-Scheme (business district ₹2000-8000), MI Road (shopping access ₹1500-5000), and Bani Park (budget ₹800-3000). Include transport connectivity and area characteristics.

pages.title: Getting Around Jaipur
pages.contentDirection: Cover Jaipur Metro (₹5-25 per journey), auto-rickshaws (₹10-15/km), app cabs, and cycle rickshaws for Old City. Include parking info, traffic patterns, and recommended routes between major attractions.

pages.title: Jaipur Travel Tips For First Time Visitors
pages.contentDirection: Essential tips including bargaining at Johari Bazaar (start 30% of quoted price), dress codes for temples, avoiding gem scams, tipping culture (10-15%), and booking composite tickets (₹1000 for 5 attractions, valid 2 days).

pages.title: Best Food In Jaipur — 2026 Guide
pages.contentDirection: Comprehensive guide to dal bati churma, ghewar, and street food. Cover Johari Bazaar food walks, rooftop restaurants with fort views, and heritage hotel dining. Include budget breakdown: street food ₹50-150, restaurants ₹300-1500 per meal.

pages.title: Best Street Food In Jaipur
pages.contentDirection: Focus on Johari Bazaar, Nehru Bazaar, and Chandpole areas. Detail specific stalls for pyaaz kachori (Rawat Mishthan), lassi at LMB, and chaat at Pandit Pav Bhaji. Include hygiene tips and price ranges ₹20-100 per item.

pages.title: Best Restaurants In Jaipur
pages.contentDirection: Cover rooftop dining at 1135 AD (City Palace views), Peacock Rooftop (Hawa Mahal views), heritage restaurants at Rambagh Palace, and local favorites like Spice Court. Include cuisine types, price ranges ₹500-3000, and booking requirements.

pages.title: Best Food Tours In Jaipur
pages.contentDirection: Review guided food walks through Old City (₹1500-2500 per person), cooking classes at heritage hotels (₹3000-5000), and self-guided food routes. Include operator recommendations, duration (3-5 hours), and dietary accommodations.

pages.title: Famous Sweets Of Jaipur
pages.contentDirection: Detail ghewar (monsoon special), feeni, and mawa kachori at legendary shops like LMB, Rawat Mishthan Bhandar, and Annapurna Bhandar. Include seasonal availability, packaging for travel, and price ranges ₹50-300 per kg.

pages.title: Best Heritage Sites In Jaipur — 2026 Guide
pages.contentDirection: Complete guide to UNESCO World Heritage sites including Amber Fort, City Palace complex, and Jantar Mantar. Cover architecture styles, Rajput history, ticket prices (₹200-750), guided tour options (₹500-1500), and photography permissions.

pages.title: Complete Guide To Amber Fort Jaipur
pages.contentDirection: Detailed coverage of elephant rides (₹1200), jeep rides (₹400), Sheesh Mahal, and Diwan-i-Khas. Include early morning visit tips (8 AM opening), sound & light show timings (6:30 PM winter), and 11km distance from city center.

pages.title: City Palace Jaipur Complete Guide
pages.contentDirection: Cover Chandra Mahal, Mubarak Mahal, and royal museums with 4-hour recommended visit time. Detail photography rules, dress code for palace areas, guided tours (₹500-800), and combination tickets with nearby Jantar Mantar.

pages.title: Hawa Mahal Jaipur — Complete Visitor Guide
pages.contentDirection: Explain 953 windows, best photography spots from opposite chai stalls, inner museum (₹50 entry), and architectural significance. Include early morning lighting tips and nearby attractions within walking distance on Badi Choupad.

pages.title: Jantar Mantar Jaipur — Astronomical Marvel Guide
pages.contentDirection: Explain Samrat Yantra (world's largest sundial), Jai Prakash Yantra, and astronomical instruments. Detail guided tour necessity (₹500-700) for understanding complex concepts, UNESCO significance, and 1-2 hour visit duration.

pages.title: Nahargarh Fort Jaipur — Sunset Views Guide
pages.contentDirection: Cover 10km drive from city, sunset timings (5-7 PM best), Madhavendra Bhawan palace, and panoramic city views. Include vehicle access (₹50 parking), café options, and combination with Jaigarh Fort visit (additional 5km).

pages.title: Jaigarh Fort — The Victory Fort Guide
pages.contentDirection: Detail Jaivana cannon (world's largest), armory museum, and treasure excavation stories. Cover 15km distance from city, combined tickets with Amber Fort (₹100 extra), and 2-3 hour exploration time with fort walls walk.

pages.title: Best Markets In Jaipur — 2026 Shopping Guide
pages.contentDirection: Complete shopping guide covering Johari Bazaar (jewelry), Bapu Bazaar (textiles), Nehru Bazaar (handicrafts). Include bargaining strategies (start 30% of quoted), authentic vs. tourist prices, shipping services, and market timing (closed Sundays).

pages.title: Johari Bazaar Jaipur Shopping Guide
pages.contentDirection: Focus on jewelry (silver ₹500-5000/piece, gems ₹1000-50000), traditional kundan work, and certified dealers vs. tourist shops. Include location near Hawa Mahal, parking options, and gem testing tips to avoid fake stones.

pages.title: Bapu Bazaar Jaipur — Textile Shopping Guide
pages.contentDirection: Cover bandhani scarves (₹200-1500), block-printed fabrics, leather juttis (₹300-1200), and custom tailoring services. Detail quality indicators, wholesale vs. retail areas, and comparison with nearby Nehru Bazaar options.

pages.title: Nehru Bazaar Jaipur — Handicrafts Guide
pages.contentDirection: Focus on blue pottery (₹100-2000), lac jewelry, carpets, and antiques. Include authentic workshop visits, price comparison with other markets, export packaging services (₹500-1500), and quality certification details.

pages.title: Tripolia Bazaar Jaipur — Iron & Brass Shopping
pages.contentDirection: Specialize in metal crafts, traditional utensils, decorative items (₹200-5000), and lac bangles. Cover wholesale opportunities, custom orders (15-day delivery), and traditional Rajasthani metalwork techniques demonstration.

pages.title: Cultural Experiences In Jaipur — 2026 Guide
pages.contentDirection: Comprehensive guide to block printing workshops, cooking classes, folk performances, and art galleries. Include authentic experience providers, pricing (₹1500-5000 per workshop), and cultural context explanations with local artisan interactions.

pages.title: Best Art Workshops In Jaipur
pages.contentDirection: Detail block printing at Anokhi Museum (₹2500), blue pottery at Neeru Kumar Studio (₹3000), and jewelry making workshops (₹2000-4000). Include duration (3-6 hours), take-home items, and advance booking requirements.

pages.title: Best Cooking Classes In Jaipur
pages.contentDirection: Cover traditional home cooking with local families (₹2500-4000), heritage hotel classes (₹5000-8000), and market visits included. Detail menu options (dal bati churma, gatte ki sabzi), duration (4-5 hours), and recipe booklets provided.

pages.title: Folk Dance Shows In Jaipur
pages.contentDirection: Detail performances at Bagore Ki Haveli (₹30-60), heritage hotels, and cultural centers. Cover Rajasthani folk dances (Ghoomar, Kalbeliya), show timings (7-8 PM), dinner packages (₹1500-3000), and photography policies.

pages.title: Best Art Galleries In Jaipur
pages.contentDirection: Cover contemporary galleries like Gallery Art Positive, traditional art at museums, and artist studios in Sanganer. Include exhibition schedules, purchasing options (₹2000-50000), and artist interaction opportunities.

pages.title: Nature & Day Trips From Jaipur — 2026 Guide
pages.contentDirection: Complete guide to Ranthambore (180km), Pushkar (150km), and Mandawa (170km) day trips. Include transport options, timing recommendations, package prices (₹3000-8000), and seasonal considerations for wildlife and weather.

pages.title: Ranthambore Day Trip From Jaipur
pages.contentDirection: Detail 3.5-hour drive, safari timings (6 AM and 3 PM slots), tiger sighting chances (30-40%), and package inclusions. Cover entry fees (₹1400 Indians, ₹1700 foreigners), jeep vs canter options (₹1800 vs ₹400), and advance booking necessity.

pages.title: Pushkar Day Trip From Jaipur
pages.contentDirection: Cover 2.5-hour drive, Brahma Temple significance, Pushkar Lake, and camel safari options (₹1500-3000). Include holy city protocols, photography restrictions, market timings, and return journey considerations with sunset viewing.

pages.title: Sisodia Rani Garden Jaipur
pages.contentDirection: Detail Mughal-style terraced gardens, 8km from city center, entry fee (₹25), and best photography times (morning light). Include combination with nearby Vidyadhar Garden and Galta Ji temple visit (additional 5km).

pages.title: Central Park Jaipur — Jogging Track Guide
pages.contentDirection: Cover 5.25km jogging track, musical fountain shows (7 PM), entry fees (₹5), and metro connectivity (Central Park station). Include morning walk timings (5:30-9 AM), children's park area, and nearby shopping at World Trade Park.

pages.title: Temples & Spiritual Sites In Jaipur — 2026 Guide
pages.contentDirection: Complete guide to Galta Ji (Monkey Temple), Govind Dev Ji Temple, and Birla Mandir. Include prayer timings, dress codes, photography rules, donation practices (₹21-501 common amounts), and spiritual significance explanations.

pages.title: Galta Ji Monkey Temple Jaipur Guide
pages.contentDirection: Detail hilltop temple complex, natural springs, monkey interactions (bring minimal items), 10km from city center. Include sunrise visit benefits (6-8 AM), temple tank bathing customs, and precautions with monkeys around food/belongings.

pages.title: Govind Dev Ji Temple Jaipur
pages.contentDirection: Cover Krishna temple inside City Palace complex, special darshan timings (4:30 AM, 12 PM, 5:30 PM), and royal family connections. Include aarti participation, prasad distribution, and photography restrictions inside sanctum.

pages.title: Birla Mandir Jaipur — Laxmi Narayan Temple
pages.contentDirection: Detail white marble architecture, evening illumination (after sunset), free entry, and Moti Dungri hill location. Include parking facilities, wheelchair accessibility, and panoramic city views from temple premises (3km from city center).

pages.title: Nightlife In Jaipur — 2026 Guide
pages.contentDirection: Cover rooftop bars with fort views, heritage hotel lounges, and cultural evening shows. Include pricing (₹500-2000 per drink), timing (till 1 AM), dress codes, and comparison between hotel bars vs standalone venues in C-Scheme area.

pages.title: Best Rooftop Bars In Jaipur
pages.contentDirection: Highlight PCO (Palace Cinema), Tattoo Café, and heritage hotel terraces with Amber Fort views. Include drink prices (₹400-1200), food options, sunset timing reservations, and fort illumination viewing (post 7 PM).

pages.title: Pubs And Clubs In Jaipur
pages.contentDirection: Cover popular venues in C-Scheme like Blackout, F Bar & Lounge, and hotel-based clubs. Detail entry fees (₹500-1500), age restrictions (21+), music styles, and weekend vs weekday crowd differences.

pages.title: Money And Currency In Jaipur
pages.contentDirection: Cover ATM availability, card acceptance at hotels/restaurants, forex counters near MI Road and railway station. Include tipping guidelines (10-15% restaurants, ₹50-100 guides), bargaining culture, and digital payment adoption in markets.

pages.title: Jaipur Airport To City Transport Guide
pages.contentDirection: Detail 13km distance to city center, taxi rates (₹400-600), prepaid taxi counters, bus services (₹25-50), and metro connectivity plans. Include ride-sharing apps availability, travel time (45 minutes), and terminal facilities.

pages.title: Jaipur Railway Station Guide
pages.contentDirection: Cover main station location, auto-rickshaw stands (₹100-200 to city center), prepaid taxi services, waiting rooms, and left luggage facilities. Include major train connections to Delhi (4-5 hours), Mumbai (12-14 hours), and platform guidance.

pages.title: Internet And SIM Cards In Jaipur
pages.contentDirection: Detail Jio/Airtel store locations near railway station and MI Road, tourist SIM requirements (passport + visa), data plans (₹200-500), and WiFi availability in hotels, cafes, and heritage sites.

pages.title: Jaipur Weather By Month
pages.contentDirection: Detail month-wise temperatures, rainfall patterns, and recommended clothing. Emphasize October-March comfort (15-28°C), April-June heat warnings (35-45°C), July-September monsoon considerations, and festival season weather coincidence.

pages.title: Visiting Jaipur With Kids
pages.contentDirection: Cover kid-friendly attractions like elephant rides at Amber Fort, Jantar Mantar interactive exhibits, and Central Park activities. Include stroller-friendly venues, child pricing (50% discount common), and family restaurants with diverse menus.

pages.title: Photography In Jaipur — Best Spots Guide
pages.contentDirection: Detail golden hour timing at Amber Fort (6-8 AM), Hawa Mahal street shots, colorful market scenes in Johari Bazaar. Include photography fees at monuments (₹25-200), drone restrictions, and respectful photography practices in religious sites.

pages.title: Budget Travel Guide To Jaipur
pages.contentDirection: Break down daily costs: accommodation ₹800-2000, food ₹300-600, transport ₹200-500, entries ₹200-400. Include free activities like Hawa Mahal exterior viewing, budget eateries, and composite ticket savings (₹1000 for 5 sites).

notes: Jaipur-specific considerations: Pink City architecture photography requires careful timing for best light. Gem scams are prevalent near major tourist sites - recommend certified dealers only. Heritage hotels offer authentic experiences but book early during peak season (October-March). Metro system is limited but growing - auto-rickshaws remain primary local transport. Composite tickets offer significant savings for multiple fort visits. Monsoon season (July-September) brings relief from heat but can affect outdoor sightseeing. Cultural sensitivity important at religious sites - modest dress mandatory. Street food is generally safe at busy stalls with high turnover. Bargaining is expected in all markets except fixed-price stores.
